snippet: Mike Sheehan, chief of the ad agency Hill Holliday, said he likes job candidates who show that they can turn their observations into insights.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Hill Holliday chief executive Mike Sheehan discussing his management technique.
lead_paragraph: Mike Sheehan, chief of the ad agency Hill Holliday, said he likes job candidates who show that they can turn their observations into insights.

headline.print_headline: Yes, You’re Smart, but What About Your Topspin?
headline.seo: Mike Sheehan of Hill Holliday, on Selfless Leadership
headline.main: Yes, You’re Smart, but What About Your Topspin?
